description: The R1® Pullover is a versatile, technical, midlayer fleece for stop/start activities in cold conditions. Made from 93% recycled polyester/7% spandex and constructed in a classic grid pattern to trap heat and wick moisture. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia R1 Pullover - Mens

specs.value: 6.9-oz Polartec® Power Grid® 93% recycled polyester, 7% spandex with Polygiene® permanent odor control

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
specs.value: Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
